getEmailAccounts Verify it returns an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.

getEmailAccounts Verify return value
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least one Email account configured. 2) Click 'GO'.

setCurrentEmailAccount Switch
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least TWO Email accounts configured. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setCurrentEmailAccount Throw INVALID PARAMETER for invalid param

Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setCurrentEmailAccount Throw INVALID PARAMETER for no param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.

deleteEmailAccount Verify it works

Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
